logic

Class ConstantValues

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.ConstantValues

  • public class ConstantValues
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains constants to be used throughout the program Jungle.
    Author:
    Andrei Letavin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BLACK_SIDE
      The constant value for the Black player and that player's pieces
      static int BLUE_SIDE
      The constant value for the Blue player, this is also equal to BLACK_SIDE
      static int BOTH_SIDES
      A constant value for a mode of play where both sides are controlled by the same keyboard/mouse
      static int COLUMNS
      The constant value for the default number of columns on a game board
      static int COMPETITIVE_MODE
      A constant value for the competitive mode of play
      static int DOWN
      The constant value for Down on the board
      static java.lang.String FILE_RULES
      The constant for the default value for the path to the rules file
      static java.lang.String FILE_RULES_EXTENSION
      The constant for the default value of the rule file extension
      static java.lang.String FILE_SPRITE_DEN
      The default constant value for the path to the den tile sprite
      static java.lang.String FILE_SPRITE_PIECES
      The default constant value for the path to the piece icon sprite
      static java.lang.String FILE_SPRITE_SELECTED
      The default constant value for the path to the selected icon color sprite
      static java.lang.String FILE_SPRITE_TRAP
      The default constant value for the path to the trap tile sprite
      static java.lang.String FILE_SPRITE_WATER
      The default constant value for the path to the water tile sprite
      static int GAMEBOARD_PADDING
      The constant value for the GUI padding for the game board
      static int GAMEPIECE_CAT
      Constant value for the cat tile source
      static int GAMEPIECE_DOG
      Constant value for the dog tile source
      static int GAMEPIECE_ELEPHANT
      Constant value for the elephant tile source
      static int GAMEPIECE_LEOPARD
      Constant value for the leopard tile source
      static int GAMEPIECE_LION
      Constant value for the lion tile source
      static int GAMEPIECE_RAT
      Constant value for the rat tile source
      static int GAMEPIECE_TIGER
      Constant value for the tiger tile source
      static int GAMEPIECE_WOLF
      Constant value for the wolf tile source
      static int GAMETILE_PADDING
      The constant value for the padding for each game tile
      static int GAMETILE_SELECTED_PADDING
      The constant value for the padding for a selected game tile
      static int LEFT
      The constant value for Left on the board
      static int MOUSECLICK_FAILURE
      Constant value for a failed mouse click event
      static int MOUSECLICK_SUCCESS_MOVED
      Constant value for a successful piece move via a mouse click
      static int MOUSECLICK_SUCCESS_SELECTED
      Constant value for a successful selection event via a mouse click
      static int NO_SIDE
      A constant value for a position belonging to neither player
      static int NUM_OF_ANIMALS
      The constant value for the default number of animals, per side, on a game board
      static int ON_TRAP
      Constant indicator value to determine if a piece is on a trap tile
      static int RED_SIDE
      The constant value for the Red player
      static int RIGHT
      The constant value for Right on the board
      static int ROWS
      The constant for the default number of rows on a game board
      static int STRONGEST_PIECE_RANK
      Constant value for the rank of the strongest piece on the board
      static int UP
      The constant value for Up on the board
      static int WEAKEST_PIECE_RANK
      Constant value for the rank of the lowest piece on the board
      static int Y_TOP_PADDING
      The constant value for the GUI padding at the top of the game board
